div.p: A Breast Radiology Document is an implementation of a Fhir Document. It is comprised of a Fhir Bundle with a top level Fhir Composition Resource that contains links to all the resources included in the Breast Radiology Report.
The Breast Radiology Document is an atomic item, meaning that no part in it can be changed without changing the entire bundle, and that all the parts are contained and in a single bundle.
The following graphic provides a high-level view of the structure of a Breast Radiology Document.
